name: showSuggestions
description: Displays a list of suggested actions that help the user analyze the data.

name: showTable
description: Display the data in a tabular format

name: showRecord
description: View a detailed record of a particular car

recordID.description: ID of the record to be displayed

name: sort
description: Sort the data by a given field and order

name: filter
description: Filter the data by a given field and condition

name: group
description: Group the data by a given field

name: aggregate
description: Aggregate data by a field using a specified operation

operation.description: The aggregation operation to apply (e.g., avg, sum, count, max, min)

name: plot
description: Visualize the data by plotting on a graph

type.description: The type of the plot (e.g., scatter, bar, line)

name: histogram
description: Create a histogram based on a specific field and bin count

field.description: The field to create the histogram from

bin_count.description: The number of bins to use in the histogram

name: describe
description: Show basic statistics for a given field (e.g., mean, median, mode, standard deviation, etc.)

field.description: The field to get statistics for

name: correlate
description: Determine the correlation between two fields

name: search
description: Search for specific value in a given field

name: replace
description: Replace a specific value in a given field with a new value

field.description: The field to replace value in

new_value.description: The new value to replace the old value with

name: highlight
description: Visually emphasize data based on a field and condition

field.description: The field to apply the highlighting on

condition.description: The condition to apply for highlighting (e.g., >, <, ==, !=)

name: timeSeriesPlot
description: Visualize a field over a time unit

field.description: The field to visualize over time

time_unit.description: The time unit for the x-axis (e.g., model year, month, day)

name: zoom
description: Zoom in or out on a visualization

action.description: The zoom action to be performed

factor.description: The zoom factor (e.g., 1.5 to zoom in 150%, 0.5 to zoom out to 50%)

name: tooltip
description: Display more information when hovering over a data point in a visualization

fields.description: Fields to display in the tooltip

name: drillDown
description: Click on a data point or segment in a visualization to see more detailed data

enable.description: Enable or disable drill down functionality

level.description: Depth of drill down (e.g., 1 for immediate child, 2 for grandchild, etc.)

name: cluster
description: Find clusters in data based on selected fields and number of clusters

name: trendLine
description: Analyze the trend of a field over a specified time unit

field.description: The field for which the trend needs to be analyzed

time_unit.description: The time unit for the x-axis (e.g., model year, month, day)

name: detectAnomalies
description: Identify any unusual values in a field that might be outliers

field.description: The field to inspect for anomalies

sensitivity.description: Sensitivity of anomaly detection (e.g., 0.05 for 5% significance level)

name: reduceDimensions
description: Reduce the dimensionality of data for visualization or simplification purposes

fields.description: Fields to consider for dimensionality reduction

number_of_dimensions.description: Desired reduced number of dimensions (e.g., 2 for 2D visualization)

method.description: Method for dimensionality reduction (e.g., PCA, t-SNE)

name: showCorrelationMatrix
description: Display correlations among all variables to identify potential relationships

fields.description: Fields to include in the correlation matrix

method.description: Method to calculate correlation (e.g., Pearson, Spearman, Kendall)
